issuer_name.reason: No seller/issuer company name or 'From' block found in the visible header area. Top-left contains a decorative line and large 'INVOICE' at top-right but no company name text.

issuer_address.reason: No multiline address block associated with an issuer/company detected. The visible address-like block on the left is the 'ISSUED TO' (recipient) section, not the issuer.

issuer_phone.reason: No phone/tel label or phone number located in the header or contact areas of the document.

issuer_email.reason: No email address text visible in the header or anywhere else on the invoice.

issuer_website.reason: No website or domain string detected in the header or contact areas.

bill_to_name.reason: Found under the 'ISSUED TO:' heading in the left upper block; first line is clearly the recipient's name.

bill_to_address.reason: Lines immediately below the recipient name under 'ISSUED TO:' form the recipient organization and address (company and street/city). Preserved as an array of lines.

bill_to_contact.reason: No explicit phone or email for the billed party found in the 'ISSUED TO' block; only name, company, and address lines are present.

invoice_number.reason: Extracted from the labeled field 'INVOICE NO:' on the right-side invoice metadata block.

terms.reason: No 'Terms' or payment terms (e.g., Net 30) text located in the invoice details area.

invoice_date.reason: Found next to label 'DATE:' in the invoice metadata block. Format is DD.MM.YYYY so normalized to ISO-8601 (YYYY-MM-DD).

due_date.reason: Found next to label 'DUE DATE:' in the invoice metadata block. Interpreted as DD.MM.YYYY and normalized to ISO-8601.

items.reason: Tabular area with headers 'DESCRIPTION', 'UNIT PRICE', 'QTY', 'TOTAL' lists six repeated rows. Values mapped per row: description text in left column, unit price in center column (100), qty in QTY column (1), and TOTAL column shows '$100'. Currency inferred from '$' sign.

subtotal.reason: The 'SUBTOTAL' label at the bottom-left of the totals block shows '$400'. Normalized to numeric 400.0.

discount.reason: No explicit discount line or negative amount present in the totals area.

tax_rate.reason: A 'Tax 10%' label is visible above the total; captured as textual percentage and normalized to decimal 0.10.

tax_amount.reason: The document shows the tax rate '10%' but does not explicitly display a separate tax monetary line/amount. Calculating would produce $40, but value is not explicitly printed so left null per mapping rules.

total.reason: The emphasized 'TOTAL' label at the bottom-right lists '$440'. Normalized to numeric 440.0.

currency.reason: Monetary amounts are prefixed with the dollar sign '$' throughout the invoice; currency normalized to 'USD'.

pay_to_name.reason: Under the 'PAY TO:' heading in the left block the first line is 'Borcele Bank' indicating the bank/payee name.

bank_account_name.reason: Line labeled 'Account Name:' under the 'PAY TO' block lists 'Adeline Palmerston' as the account name.

bank_account_number.reason: Line labeled 'Account No.:' shows '0123 4567 8901'. Normalized by removing spaces to a continuous digit string.

payment_instructions.reason: No additional freeform payment instruction lines beyond the PAY TO bank name, account name and account number were present.

document_title.reason: Large top-right text 'INVOICE' indicates document type.

logo_or_brand.reason: No distinct logo text or image filename is extractable; top-left contains only a decorative line not recognizable as a brand name or logo text.

notes.reason: No separate notes, terms, or memo body text detected aside from structured fields already captured.
